attributes.title: Mac Gamer Switch Parody
attributes.description: Ever heard of a Mac Gamer Neither have we.

attributes.title: RT Comic Timelapse
attributes.caption: Luke drawing the latest RT Comic
attributes.description: This nifty little video shows Luke drawing the latest RT Comic at super high speeds.

attributes.title: Cracker Contest
attributes.caption: Geoff and Gav try to eat 7 Saltines in one minute.
attributes.description: Geoff and Gav try to eat 7 Saltines in one minute.

attributes.title: Ninja Gus
attributes.caption: Silent but deadly.
attributes.description: Silent but deadly.

attributes.title: RT Comic Timelapse (writer style)
attributes.description: Griffon one-ups Luke by making the best creative process video ever.

attributes.title: The Recording Session
attributes.caption: In the box with Shannon McCormick.
attributes.description: This is a dialog recording session from last year that was very important for Shannon. Burnie and Geoff share some unusual insights.

attributes.title: Spoiler Alert
attributes.caption: Don't give away the ending.
attributes.description: Joel and Matt have a friendly discussion about movies. Then Joel punches Matt in the face. You might want to watch this short before someone ruins it for you.

attributes.title: Writer's Balk
attributes.caption: When screenwriting goes awry...
attributes.description: Joel tries to write an awesome Rooster Teeth short, but everyone keeps messing with me! Stop being jerks and ruining my genius!

attributes.title: Saving Face
attributes.caption: The first cut is the hardest.
attributes.description: Burnie and Gus discuss the terrible state of the economy and try to figure out ways to save.

attributes.title: Dev Cycle
attributes.caption: If at first you don't succeed...
attributes.description: Geoff tries to create his own video game starring an unlikely hero.

attributes.title: Random, Mandatory
attributes.caption: This video is not optional.
attributes.description: Burnie tries to explain to Geoff the importance of filling certain company requirements.

attributes.title: Catch
attributes.caption: A Special Father's Day Video
attributes.description: Matt, Joel and Nathan share a game of catch and memories of their fathers...

attributes.title: Crazy Dream
attributes.caption: This video is so hot.
attributes.description: Geoff tells Joel about this totally crazy dream he had. I mean, like, super crazy.

attributes.title: Lunch Bunch
attributes.caption: BYOL
attributes.description: Gus and Matt have a little coffee talk in the kitchen.

attributes.title: Warning / Error
attributes.caption: That does not compute.
attributes.description: Gus helps Joel with an epic computer malfunction.

attributes.title: Gratuities Are Appreciated
attributes.caption: This video will automatically play for parties of six or more.
attributes.description: Geoff and Burnie discuss a new revenue incentive program at the company.

attributes.title: Hotel Buddies
attributes.caption: What happens at Comic-Con...
attributes.description: In San Diego, Joel and Matt share a room for the first time since college.

attributes.title: Mixed Messages
attributes.caption: While you were out...
attributes.description: Geoff receives some unexpected news from Gavino. And some more. And a little more after that.

attributes.title: Behind RT Shorts: Dress Rehearsal
attributes.caption: They can't all be winners.
attributes.description: Behind the scenes of a failed RT short.

attributes.title: Blur
attributes.caption: Parental Guidance Suggested
attributes.description: Matt explains his new technique for increasing the production value of the videos.

attributes.title: Secret Door
attributes.caption: Mysterious, Unknown, Wooden.
attributes.description: Gavino becomes very curious about a Door no one in the office wants him to open.

attributes.title: Pongo
attributes.caption: Introducing The Newest Member of Our Team
attributes.description: Burnie introduces the rest of the group to the new, slightly controversial company intern.

attributes.title: Chain of Thought
attributes.caption: Thinking Out Loud
attributes.description: Go inside the minds of Rooster Teeth and discover why nothing ever gets done around here.

attributes.title: New Old Car
attributes.caption: Keep it Authentic
attributes.description: Jason shows Gus his totally authentic, completely retro new ride.

attributes.title: Conspiracy Weary
attributes.caption: The last in the RT Shorts saga?
attributes.description: Matt exposes Joel to a whole list of Conspiracy Theories that tie in all of the crazy stuff that's been happening around the office.
